entries.title: Rackspace customers are still being affected by Microsoft Exchange issue
entries.description: Rackspace customers still impacted by disruption to its Microsoft Exchange service caused by recent cyberattack.

entries.title: Netflix will stream Nike workouts to help meet your New Year's fitness resolution
entries.description: Collaborating with Nike Training Club, Netflix will host workout programs of varying intensity and you don't need equipment.

entries.title: Corsair keyboards began typing on their own - but it's not malware
entries.description: Bizarre bug that involves macro recording hits some Corsair keyboards.

entries.title: Quora wants to help you talk like ChatGPT
entries.description: OpenAI’s ChatGPT has shaken the industry, and Quora is among the handful of companies urgently playing catchup.

entries.title: Zerobot botnet expands to start exploiting Apache flaws
entries.description: Dreaded Zerobot IoT botnet now utilizes two Apache flaws to assimilate more endpoints.

entries.title: You can now get DaVinci Resolve from the App Store
entries.description: App Store customers can download Hollywood's favorite free video editor now.

entries.title: Two Tomb Raider games just got last-minute delays into 2023
entries.description: Guardian of Light and Temple of Osiris have been pushed to 2023, says developer Feral Interactive.

entries.title: These new Google Meet filters are like something out of your worst nightmare
entries.description: Two months late for Halloween, Google Meet has unleashed some rather bizarre new face filters.

entries.title: AI isn't really helping coders write better or more secure code
entries.description: Be careful when using AI to help you write code - that's the take away from a new study on the matter.

entries.title: Microsoft's latest Patch Tuesday broke some VMs, but there's a fix
entries.description: A set of Microsoft Patch Tuesday updates has impacted users spinning up new VMs on Hyper-V.

entries.title: World of Warcraft devs say it ‘needs to do better’, announcing new quests and more
entries.description: Dragonflight devs promise ‘more story, more content, more rewards’ over six content updates.

entries.title: Experts have found a whole new attack vector for AWS
entries.description: New features come with new risks, and Elastic IP transfer is no different.

entries.title: Most cyberattacks now use encrypted channels
entries.description: Hiding malware in encrypted traffic makes it harder to detect and mitigate, new report claims.

entries.title: Nvidia RTX 4070 GPU could arrive soon – but don’t get your hopes too high
entries.description: Regulatory filing is a clue that the RTX 4070 Ti and RTX 4070 might just launch together – but don’t count on it.

entries.title: Microsoft, Amazon and Meta among those ditching office space in London and Europe
entries.description: For every success story about Big Tech learning its lesson when it comes to remote work, another behemoth drags its heels.

entries.title: Your next Google Chrome update could be here sooner than you think, if you're lucky
entries.description: Some lucky Google Chrome users will get updates a bit earlier.

entries.title: Opera GX has a Christmas easter egg for you - alongside making videos crisper
entries.description: Opera loves their easter eggs, and they've whispered one to TechRadar before the holidays arrive.

entries.title: VMware now offers managed cloud storage
entries.description: VMware Cloud on AWS customers will soon be able to use the company’s Cloud Flex Storage - priced per GB.

entries.title: Best Xbox Game Pass Streaming accessories
entries.description: From the Razer Kishi to the Moga mobile range, these are the best Xbox Game Pass Streaming accessories.

entries.title: Watch out AMD – overclocked Intel Raptor Lake flagship CPU has blasted past 9GHz
entries.description: It’s finally happened: the 9GHz barrier has been broken for the first time.

entries.title: Okta confirms code breach, but says no customer data was harmed
entries.description: Okta says breach does not affect its customers and that its services remain fully operational.

entries.title: It’s a Christmas miracle; I can finally afford an Overwatch 2 skin
entries.description: The Overwatch 2 shop now has its cheapest skin available to festive fans.

entries.title: No, Charlie Cox's Daredevil won't be in Marvel's Deadpool 3
entries.description: Daredevil star Charlie Cox has clarified comments he made about the Marvel superhero potentially appearing in Deadpool 3.

entries.title: Apple finally updates AirTags to help you seek out suspiciously placed tags
entries.description: Your iPhone will be able to better detect unknown AirTags and sound the alarm.

entries.title: Could 2023 finally be the year of the color Kindle?
entries.description: E Ink's new Gallery 3 screen tech promises superior color saturation on ereader displays, and it's being mass produced.
